 Promotion for new pre-paid subscription in December, 2013 TIME: center 1: 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 23, 24, 25, 26, 27, 30 and 31 December, 2013 center 2: 7, 8, 9, 18, 19, 20, 27, 28, 29, and 30 December, 2013 . center 3: 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 19, 20, 21, 25, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30, and 31 December, 2013 center 4: No launching dispatch center 5: from 15th to 31st December, 2013. center 6: 10, 11, 12, 18, 19, 20, 26, 27, and 28 December, 2013 I. Program 1: 1. Eligibility: VND0 starter kits ( MobiCard , MobiZone, MobiQ and S30) activated during the promotional period . Note : S30 is not applied at Center 2 Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 kits and other which are switched to Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 kits (both not yet activated and activated ) IS NOT allowed to join this program. 2. Content: a . Promotion for first top-up which must be loaded BEFORE 28th February, 2014, if not eligible, subscribers cannot receive benefits and reserve : Bonus 100% top-up value: Top-up value Bonus KM2 credit KM 3 credit VND5.000 VND2.500 VND2.500 VND10.000 VND5.000 VND5.000 VND20.000 VND 10 .000 VND 10 .000 VND30.000 VND15.000 VND15.000 VND50.000 VND25.000 VND25.000 VND100.000 VND50.000 VND50.000 VND200.000 VND 100 .000 VND 100 .000 VND300.000 VND150.000 VND150.000 VND500.000 VND250.000 VND250.000 b. Promotion for the next 5 top-ups (2nd - 6th top-up) which must be loaded BEFORE 31st March, 2014 : Bonus 50% top-up value: Top-up value Bonus KM2 credit KM 3 credit VND5.000 VND1.250 VND1.250 VND10.000 VND2.500 VND2.500 VND20.000 VND5.000 VND5.000 VND30.000 VND7.500 VND7.500 VND50.000 VND12.500 VND12.500 VND100.000 VND25.000 VND25.000 VND200.000 VND50.000 VND50.000 VND300.000 VND75.000 VND75.000 VND500.000 VND125.000 VND125.000 c. Periodically bonus ( NOT applied for S30 ) Eligible subscribers will be added VND 30.000/month into the KM1 credit with the first addition on the day after the activation. SMS content : "[TB] MobiFone da cong 30.000d vao TK KM1. Nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang de huong uu dai thang tiep theo" Eligibility for bonus added to KM DK2 credit : General condition : Subscribers must have active one-way or two-way communication. At the evaluating time for the first periodically bonus: The balance in KM1 credit must be at least VND10.000 Subscriber must load at least VND10.000 in the previous month SMS content: "[TB] MobiFone da cong 30.000d vao TK DK2. T/g su dung toi da: 30 ngay tu dd/mm/yyyy. Nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang de huong uu dai thang tiep theo" At the evaluating time for the next 10 times: Subscriber must load at least VND10.000 in the previous month SMS content which is sent 5 days before the addition to KM ĐK2 credit: "[TB] Quy khach vui long nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang truoc dd/mm/yy hh:mm:ss de duoc huong uu dai dinh ky 30.000d/thang. Chi tiet lien he 9090" 11 times of bonus added to ĐK2 credit cannot be reserved. dd/mm/yyyy: the date when addition is made successfully 1 month is considered as 30 days. Promotional credit can be used within 30 days. If subscriber is under other promotions that add bonus to ĐK 2 credit , the balance in ĐK2 credit will reset to 0 before adding bonus from the new promotion. d. Regulation for bonus days of use after activation: eligible MobiQ subscribers will receive extra 60 days of use right after activation. II. Program 2: 1. Eligibility: a. Type 1: MobiCard, MobiZone, MobiQ starter kits : Issued before 1st January, 2013 and not yet activated Available at the stores and agencies, with me main balance of more than VND0, excluding the subscription fee and SIM card cost (Price listed by the stores and agencies is the same with the price printed on the kit). Activated during the promotional period. Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 kits and other which are switched to Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 kits (both not yet activated and activated ) IS NOT allowed to join this program. b. Type 2 : MobiCard, MobiZone, and MobiQ starter kit: Issued before 1st August, 2011 and not yet activated. Main balance has more than VND0. Listing closed on 27th December, 2013 Activated from 28th December, 2013 to 31st January, 2014 2. Content: a . Bonus 100% (equal amount) of the balance value in TKC credit, 50% added to KM2 credit, 50% added to KM3 credit. b. Promotion for the next 5 top-ups: Bonus 50% top-up value: Type 1 : must load BEFORE 31st March, 2014 Type 2 : must load BEFORE 30th April, 2014 Top-up value Content KM2 credit KM 3 credit VND5.000 VND1.250 VND1.250 VND10.000 VND2.500 VND2.500 VND20.000 VND5.000 VND5.000 VND30.000 VND7.500 VND7.500 VND50.000 VND12.500 VND12.500 VND100.000 VND25.000 VND25.000 VND200.000 VND50.000 VND50.000 VND300.000 VND75.000 VND75.000 VND500.000 VND125.000 VND125.000 For MobiCard and MobiZone subscribers: the minimum days of use is 15 days (as listed in the regulations of Dispatch 6049/VMS-GCTT ,28th December, 2012 about Price of pre-paid starter kit). Regulations for MobiQ subscribers are as normal. 3. Periodical promotion: applied for type 2 only Bonus VND 30.000/month added to KM1 credit for the first addition after the date of activation. SMS content: "[TB] MobiFone da cong 30.000d vao TK KM1. Nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang de huong uu dai thang tiep theo" Eligibility for bonus added in KM DK2 : Subscriber must have active one-way or two-way communication. At the moment of first periodical addition: The balance in KM1 credit must be at least VND10.000 Subscriber must load at least VND10.000 in the previous month SMS content: "[TB] MobiFone da cong 30.000d vao TK DK2. T/g su dung toi da: 30 ngay tu dd/mm/yyyy. Nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang de huong uu dai thang tiep theo" Ath the moment of the next 10 periodical additions: Subscriber must load at least VND10.000 in the previous month SMS sent 5 days before the addition added to KM ĐK2 credit: "[TB] Quy khach vui long nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang truoc dd/mm/yy hh:mm:ss de duoc huong uu dai dinh ky 30.000d/thang. Chi tiet lien he 9090" 11 additions cannot be reserved . 1 month is considered 30 days. Promotional credit will be valid within 30 days. If subscribers join any other promotions that add bonus to ĐK2 credit, the balance in ĐK2 credit will reset back to 0 before adding bonus from the new promotion. III. Program 3: 1. Eligibility: M0 Starter kit which is MobiCard, MobiZone or MobiQ activated during the promotional period. 2. Content: Note : (Center 5) To receive bonus, subscribers must have the main balance of more than VND0 at the evaluating time a. Promotion for first top-ups as in "	"Chính sách bán hàng khi khách hàng sử dụng bộ M0"	": First top-up : Eligibility: load before the last active day (since activation) Content: Bonus 100% value (50% added to KM2 credit and 50% added to KM3 credit). 5 next top-ups (2nd - 6th top-up) Eligibility : load before one-way communication is blocked, before the 90th day since activation Content: Bonus 50% value (25% added to KM2 credit and 25% added to KM3 credit). b. Eligible subscribers will receive the periodically bonus as listed in section 2.c, 2.d (Program 1) IV. Program 4: (Note: is not launched in Center 2) 1. Eligibility: Zone+ starter kit ( M0 kit, VND0kit ) activated during the promotional period . 2. Content: Beside the benefits currently regulated, eligible subscribers will receive extra 60 days of use right after activation. 2013&#24180;12&#26376;&#26032;&#39044;&#20184;&#36153;&#21495;&#30721;&#20837;&#32593;&#20248;&#24800;&#27963;&#21160; Nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang de huong uu dai thang tiep theo" &#31995;&#32479;&#36827;&#34892;&#19979;10&#27425;&#23450;&#26399;&#36192;&#36865;&#20248;&#24800;&#27454;&#39033;&#26102;&#65306; &#23458;&#25143;&#19978;&#20010;&#26376;&#20805;&#20540;&#26368;&#20302;&#39069;&#20026;10, 000&#36234;&#30462;&#20197;&#19978; ĐK2&#36134;&#25143;&#33719;&#36192; &#20248;&#24800;&#27454;&#39033; &#26102;&#38388;&#30340;&#21069;5&#26085;&#65292;&#31995;&#32479;&#23558;&#36827;&#34892;&#21457;&#30701;&#20449;&#32473;&#23458;&#25143;&#65306; "[TB] Quy khach vui long nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang truoc dd/mm/yy hh:mm:ss de duoc huong uu dai dinh ky 30.000d/thang. Chi tiet lien he 9090" 11 &#27425; ĐK2 &#36134; &#25143;&#33719;&#36192;&#30340;&#20248;&#24800;&#27454;&#39033;&#65306;&#19981;&#33021;&#32047;&#35745;&#20351;&#29992; dd/mm/yyyy&#65306; &#26159;&#36134;&#25143;&#19978;&#33719;&#36192;&#20248;&#24800;&#25104;&#21151;&#30340;&#26085;&#26399; 1&#20010;&#26376;&#20026; 30&#26085; &#20248;&#24800;&#36134;&#25143;&#27454;&#39033;&#20165;&#38480;&#20110;30&#22825;&#20869;&#20351;&#29992; &#22914; &#26524;&#23458;&#25143;&#21516;&#26102;&#20139;&#21463; &#21478;&#22806; &#30340;ĐK2 &#36134;&#25143;&#33719;&#36192;&#20248;&#24800;&#27963;&#21160;&#65292; ĐK2 &#30340;&#20313;&#39069;&#23558; &#34987;&#28165;&#38646;&#21518;&#25165;&#33719;&#36192;&#27492;&#27963;&#21160;&#30340;&#20248;&#24800;&#27454;&#39033; III. &#27963;&#21160;&#19977;&#65306; 1.&#23545;&#35937;&#65306; &#38480;&#20110; M0 &#22871;&#39184; &#65288; MobiCard, MobiZone &#21450; MobiQ &#65289;&#22312;&#20248;&#24800;&#26102;&#38388;&#20869;&#36827;&#34892;&#28608;&#27963; 2.&#20248;&#24800;&#39069;&#24230;&#65306; &#27880; &#65306;&#20110;&#20013;&#24515;&#20116;&#33539;&#22260;&#30340;&#23458;&#25143;&#20026;&#20102;&#20139;&#21463;&#20248;&#24800;&#65292;&#22312; &#31995;&#32479;&#36827;&#34892;&#36192;&#36865;&#20248;&#24800;&#27454;&#39033;&#26102;&#65292;&#23458;&#25143;&#30340;&#20027;&#36134;&#25143;&#20313;&#39069;&#38656; > 0&#36234;&#30462; a.&#23458;&#25143;&#33021;&#20139;&#21463;"	" M0&#22871;&#39184;&#20986;&#21806;&#25919;&#31574;"	"&#30340;&#21069;&#20960;&#27425; &#20805;&#20540;&#20248;&#24800; &#21021;&#27425;&#20805;&#20540;&#65306; &#26465;&#20214;&#65306;&#21495;&#30721;&#22312; &#21452;&#21521;&#20572;&#26426;&#29366;&#24577;&#20043;&#21069;&#20805;&#20540;&#65288;&#28608;&#27963;&#25104;&#21151;&#26102;&#31639;&#36215;&#65289; &#20248;&#24800;&#39069;&#24230;&#65306; &#33719;&#36192;100%&#20805;&#20540;&#21345;&#38754;&#20540;&#65288; KM2 &#36134;&#25143;&#33719;&#36192;50%&#21450;KM3&#36134;&#25143;&#33719;&#36192;50%&#65289; &#19979;5&#27425;&#20805;&#20540;&#20248;&#24800;&#65288; &#31532;&#20108;&#27425;&#33267;&#31532;&#20845;&#27425;&#20805;&#20540;&#65289; &#26465;&#20214;&#65306;&#21495;&#30721;&#22312;&#21333;&#21521;&#20572;&#26426;&#29366;&#24577;&#20043;&#21069;&#21450; &#28608;&#27963;&#26085;&#36215;&#30340;&#31532; 90&#26085; &#21069;&#20805;&#20540; &#20248;&#24800;&#39069;&#24230;&#65306; &#33719;&#36192;50%&#20805;&#20540;&#21345;&#38754;&#20540;&#65288; KM2 &#36134;&#25143;&#33719;&#36192;25%&#21450;KM3&#36134;&#25143;&#33719;&#36192;25%&#65289; b. &#27492;&#27963;&#21160;&#30340;&#20248;&#24800;&#23545;&#35937;&#20173;&#21487;&#20139;&#21463; &#27963;&#21160;&#19968; &#30340;&#23450;&#26399;&#33719;&#36192;&#20248;&#24800;&#27454;&#39033;/&#20351;&#29992;&#26085;&#65288;2.c, 2.d&#27454;&#65289; IV. &#27963;&#21160;&#22235;&#65306;&#65288;&#27880;&#65306;&#20013;&#24515;&#20108;&#27809;&#26377;&#25512;&#20986;&#27492;&#27963;&#21160;&#65289; 1.&#23545;&#35937;&#65306; M0&#21450;0&#36234;&#30462;&#20837;&#32593;&#22871;&#39184;&#30340; "	"Chính sách bán hàng khi khách hàng sử dụng bộ M0"	"&#12503;&#12525;&#12464;&#12521;&#12512;&#12393;&#12358;&#12426;&#12289; &#21021;&#12417;&#12390;&#12481;&#12515;&#12540;&#12472;&#12377;&#12427;&#26178;&#29305;&#21029;&#25201;&#12356;&#12434;&#21463;&#12369;&#12427;&#12290; Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 &#46608;&#45716; Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 &#47196; &#48320;&#44221;&#54624; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; ( &#44060;&#53685;&#46108; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; 5&#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#52649;&#51204; &#49884; &#54812;&#53469; ( 2014&#45380; 3&#50900; 31&#51068; &#51060;&#51204;&#50640; &#52649;&#51204;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796;.) : &#52649;&#51204;&#49884; &#44552;&#50529;2 &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#44552;&#50529;3 5.000 1.250 1.250 10.000 2.500 2.500 20.000 5.000 5.000 30.000 7.500 7.500 50.000 12.500 12.500 100.000 25.000 25.000 200.000 50.000 50.000 300.000 75.000 75.000 500.000 125.000 125.000 c. &#51221;&#44592; Nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang de huong uu dai thang tiep theo" &#45796;&#51020; &#45804;&#48512;&#53552; &#44228;&#49549; &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828;&#47484; ( KM DK2 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640;)&#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45716; &#51312;&#44148;: &#51068;&#48152; &#51312;&#44148;: &#48716;&#49888;&#51060;&#45208; &#49688;&#49888;&#51060; &#44032;&#45733;&#54620;&#45796;. &#52395;&#48264;&#51704; &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828;&#47484; &#52628;&#44032;&#54624; &#46412;: &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#44552;&#50529;1 &#44228;&#51221; &#50640;&#49436; &#45224;&#51008; &#44552;&#50529;&#51060; 10,000&#46041;&#48120;&#47564; &#51080;&#50612;&#50556; &#46108;&#45796;. &#51648;&#45212; &#45804;&#50640; &#52572;&#49548; 10,000&#46041; &#52649;&#51204;&#54644;&#50556; &#46108;&#45796;. &#53685;&#51648;&#54616;&#45716; &#47928;&#45796; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648; &#45236;&#50857;: [TB] MobiFone da cong 30.000d vao TK DK2. III. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;3: 1. &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948; &#51201;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54624; MobiCard, MobiZone, MobiQ 0 &#46041;&#50836;&#44552;&#51228; 2. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#45236;&#50857; &#50976;&#51032;: (&#49468;&#53552;5): &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#44592; &#50948;&#54644; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828;&#47484; &#52628;&#44032;&#54624; &#46412; &#51452;&#50836; &#44552;&#50529;&#51008; 0&#46041;&#51060;&#49345; &#51080;&#50612;&#50556; &#46108;&#45796;. a. &#54812;&#53469;: &#52395;&#48264;&#51704; &#52649;&#51204; &#51312;&#44148;: &#49688;&#49888;&#51060; &#51221;&#51648;&#46104;&#44592; &#51204;&#50640; &#52649;&#51204;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796;. (&#44060;&#53685;&#54624; &#46412;&#48512;&#53552;) &#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300;&#51032; &#50529;&#47732;&#44032;&#44201; 100% &#47484; &#52628;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796; ( &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; 2 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640; 50%, &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; 3 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640; 50%) &#45796;&#51020;&#50640; 5 &#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300; &#47484; &#52649;&#51204; &#49884; &#54812;&#53469; : &#48156;&#49888;&#51060; &#51221;&#51648;&#46104;&#44592; &#51204;&#50640; &#46608;&#45716; &#44060;&#53685; &#49884;&#48512;&#53552; 90&#51068;&#44036;&#50640; &#52649;&#51204;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796;. &#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300;&#51032; &#50529;&#47732;&#44032;&#44201;&#51032; 50% &#47484; &#52628;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796; .( &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; 2 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640; 25%, &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; 3 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640; 25%) b. &#50948; &#51201;&#50857;&#46108; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#44032; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;1&#51032; &#44508;&#51221;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972; (2.c, 2.d &#54637;&#47785;) &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828;&#47484; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796;. IV. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;4: (&#50976;&#51032;: &#49468;&#53552;2&#50640; &#51201;&#50857; &#50504; &#46108;&#45796;) 1. &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948;: &#51201;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54624; 0&#46041; Zone+ &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; 2. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#45236;&#50857;: &#54788;&#54665;&#51032; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#50808;&#50640; &#51201;&#50857;&#46108; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#45716; &#44060;&#53685;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; &#49324;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036; 60 &#51068;&#51012; &#52628;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796; . &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070; &#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6035;&#6085;&#6017;&#6082; 12/2013 &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6080;&#6040;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6102; MBF KV 1, MBF KV 4, MBF KV 6: 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 23, 24, 25, 26, 27, 30, 31/12/2013 MBF KV 2: 7, 8, 9, 18, 19, 20, 27, 28, 29, 30/12/2013 . MBF KV 6: 10, 11, 12, 18, 19, 20, 26, 27, 28/12/2013 I. &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 1&#6102; 1. &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; ( &#6040;&#6071;&#6035; &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041; S30 ) &#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6017;&#6070; KM1 &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6043;&#6078;&#6016;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6026;&#6086;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;&#6018;&#6074;&#6023;&#6070;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6070; Nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang de huong uu dai thang tiep theo" &#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6017;&#6017;&#6030;&#6098;&#6028;&#6026;&#6078;&#6040;&#6098;&#6036;&#6072;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; DK2 : &#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6017;&#6017;&#6030;&#6098;&#6028;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6102; &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042; 1 &#6042;&#6074; 2 &#6017;&#6070;&#6020;&#6100; &#6035;&#6085;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6022;&#6082;&#6016;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6042;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6044;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018;&#6043;&#6078;&#6016;&#6033;&#6072; 1&#6102; &#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; TK KM1 &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6031;&#6071;&#6021;&#6036;&#6086; &#6037;&#6075;&#6031; 10.000đ &#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6017;&#6082;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6035;&#6084;&#6087; &#6017;&#6098;&#6043;&#6073;&#6040;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042; SMS&#6102; "[TB] MobiFone da cong 30.000d vao TK DK2. 30 &#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6100; &#6036;&#6078;&#6047;&#6071;&#6035;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6037;&#6098;&#6047;&#6081;&#6020;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6017;&#6098;&#6043;&#6073;&#6040;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072; ĐK2, &#6018;&#6074;&#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6026;&#6082;&#6043;&#6035;&#6085;&#6047;&#6043;&#6091;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072; ĐK2 &#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044; reset &#6043;&#6075;&#6036;&#6021;&#6084;&#6043;&#6040;&#6016;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017; 0 &#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6032;&#6098;&#6040;&#6072;&#6100; III. &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 3&#6102; 1. &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; &#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; M0 &#6018;&#6074;&#6023;&#6070; MobiCard, MobiZone, MobiQ &#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6100; 2. &#6016;&#6086;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6102; &#6047;&#6086;&#6018;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091; : (MBF KV 5) &#6026;&#6078;&#6040;&#6098;&#6036;&#6072;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;, &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072;&#6018;&#6084;&#6043; > 0đ &#6035;&#6085;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6022;&#6082;&#6016;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6100; a. &#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6050;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076; KM3)&#6100; b. &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;
